pullrequest.title: Property panel for desktop and mobile (non-editable)

content.raw:
This part got a bit messy because earlier trying to open a tab that is already open was closing it. But I had already changed that.

Now when the user clicks on an entity at the Scene Tree, the tab opens. And if the option `Open tree on model selection` is on and the user clicks on a model on the tree, the tab is opened twice...

commit b3b7501
content.html:
This part got a bit messy because earlier trying to open a tab that is already open was closing it. But I had already changed that.

Now when the user clicks on an entity at the Scene Tree, the tab opens. And if the option Open tree on model selection is on and the user clicks on a model on the tree, the tab is opened twice...
